TEXT.English: Increased production and commerce in your capital
Increased Worker work rate; extra production from pastures; extra commerce from farms
Increases great general emergence; can draft two units per turn; extra happiness from barracks'

TEXT.French: La forme la plus primitive de doctrine légale.
TEXT.Italian: La forma di Sistema legale più primitiva

TEXT.English: Increased commerce in all cities; extra commerce from towns; can spend gold to finish production of buildings
Extra production from specialists; extra food from workshops and watermills; less commerce from windmills, watermills and towns; double production speed for factories and coal plants
Increased maintenance from number of cities; specialists produce food if city works less than seven tiles
No negative Stability Points for low amount of traded resources; no negative Stability Points for poor economy
TEXT.French: Pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour un faible niveau de ressources échangées ; pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour une économie pauvre
TEXT.German: Keine Stabilitätspunktabzüge durch geringfügig gehandelte Ressourcen; keine Stabilitätspunktabzüge durch schlechte Wirtschaftslage
TEXT.Italian: Nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di scarso commercio di risorse; nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di scarsa economia.
TEXT.Spanish: No hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por baja cantidad de recursos intercambiados; no hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por economía débil

TEXT.French: La forme la plus primitive de doctrine économique.
TEXT.Italian: La forma di economia più primitiva

TEXT.French: La forme la plus primitive de doctrine politique.
TEXT.Italian: La forma di Governo più primitiva
TEXT.Spanish: El principio de gobierno más primitivo.

TEXT.English: Military units in cities increase happiness to a maximum of +6
[ICON_BULLET]No negative Stability Points for poor economy
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour une économie pauvre
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di scarsa economia.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por economía débil

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Unable to Use Slaves[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_UNHAPPY] Penalty for Slaves in Civs without [LINK=literal]Egalitarianism[\LINK]
May hire double the amount of artists, scientists and merchants; unhappiness penalty for all civilizations without egalitarianism

Reduced unhealthiness in all cities; extra commerce from windmills, watermills and forest preserves; extra happiness from public transportation; double production speed for recycling centers and hydro plants; no stability penalty from economic stagnation
Extra unhappiness from non-state religions; cities with state religion train units faster; no spread of non-state religions
Extra commerce from plantations and slave plantations, can sacrifice city population to finish production
Extra trade route in all cities; increased corporation commerce
Extra commerce from workshops and watermills; extra unhappiness from banks; double production speed for forges, markets and grocers
[ICON_BULLET]Extra stability for controlling foreign cores[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduced likeliness of respawns on your territory
Extra stability from controlling foreign cores; reduced likeliness of respawns on your territory
May hire double the amount of engineers; increased production in all cities; extra production from workshops and watermills
Lower unit support costs; military units produced with food; double production speed for castles

No additional income from foreign trade routes; +50% income from trade routes to and from capital; extra commerce from plantations and slave plantations; double production speed for customs houses; reduced expansion penalty for overseas colonies
Double production speed for walls; can spend gold to finish production of units; hurried units start with the mercenary promotion
Increased war weariness; free specialist in all cities; +25% income from trade routes with defensive pact partners; increased upkeep for military units
Extra experience for naval units; increased production speed for naval units; extra production from fishing boats and high sea fishing boats; double production speed for drydocks
[ICON_BULLET]No negative Stability Points from cities under occupation
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour les villes occupées
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di città occupate.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por las ciudades sometidas a ocupación

TEXT.English: Adds a Stability Points bonus on city conquest; no negative Stability Points from cities under occupation
TEXT.French: Ajoute un bonus de points de stabilité par ville conquise ; pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour les villes occupées
TEXT.German: Stabilitätspunktbonus bei Stadteroberung; keine Stabilitätspunktabzüge durch besetzte Städte
TEXT.Italian: Aggiunge un bonus di punti stabilità per la conquista di città; nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di città occupate.
TEXT.Spanish: Añade una bonificación de puntos de estabilidad por conquista de ciudades; no hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por las ciudades sometidas a ocupación

TEXT.English: Extra unhappiness from non-state religions; cities with state religion construct buildings faster
No state religion; extra unhappiness from non-state religions; extra happiness from pagan temples; can build classical wonders
Decreased unhappiness from corporations, extra research from specialists, double production speed for hospitals and universities
May hire double the amount of statesmen; increased happiness in six largest cities; extra happiness from courthouses
Increases great people birth rate; cottages, hamlets and villages develop faster
Adds a Stability Points bonus for each city founded at least 15 tiles from the capital
TEXT.French: Ajoute un bonus de points de stabilité par ville fondée à 15 cases ou plus de la capitale
TEXT.German: Stabilitätspunktbonus für jede Stadt, die mindestens 15 Geländefelder von der Hauptstadt entfernt gegründet wurde
TEXT.Italian: Aggiunge un bonus di punti stabilità per ogni città fondata ad almeno 15 caselle dalla capitale.
TEXT.Spanish: Añade una bonificación de puntos de estabilidad por cada ciudad fundada al menos a 15 casillas de la capital

TEXT.English: Can build missionaries without monasteries; increases great people birth rate in cities with state religion; extra unhappiness from non-state religions
[ICON_BULLET]Can Build All Wonders that Require a State Religion
No state religion; increases science in all cities; can build wonders that require a state religion
Can sacrifice city population to finish production
TEXT.French: Permet de sacrifier la population de la ville pour achever la production en cours.
TEXT.German: Opfert Bevölkerung, um die Produktion zu beschleunigen.
TEXT.Italian: Possibilità di sacrificare la popolazione cittadina per completare la produzione
TEXT.Spanish: Se puede sacrificar población de la ciudad para terminar la producción.

TEXT.English: Extra experience for land units; extra production from forts; double production speed for barracks' and stables
Extra production from specialists, extra food from workshops and watermills, double production speed for factories and coal plants
No maintenance penalty for distance to Palace
May hire double the amount of priests; extra happiness from state religion; extra unhappiness from non-state religions; cities with state religion give extra experience
[ICON_BULLET]No stability penalty for conquered cities or minority culture

No maintenance cost from distance to palace; military units in cities increase happiness to a limit of +4; extra espionage from specialists; no stability penalty for conquered cities or from minority cultures
Extra happiness in largest cities; extra production from towns
Extra experience for all units; extra commerce from forts; extra happiness from castles; extra stability from vassals
Adds a Stability Points bonus for each vassal
TEXT.French: Ajoute un bonus de points de stabilité par vassal
TEXT.Italian: Aggiunge un punto stabilità per ogni vassallo.
TEXT.Spanish: Añade una bonificación de puntos de estabilidad por cada vasallo

TEXT.English: Adds a Stability Points bonus for each civilization starting point controlled
TEXT.French: Ajoute un bonus de points de stabilité par point de départ de civilisation contrôlé
TEXT.Italian: Aggiunge un punto stabilità per ogni punto di avvio di civiltà controllato.
TEXT.Spanish: Añade una bonificación de puntos de estabilidad por cada punto de inicio de civilización controlado

TEXT.English: Decreased war unhappiness, double production speed of Barracks' and stables, no stability penalty for conquered cities
